# JaxOpenSimplex
OpenSimplex Written in Jax

# Usage
```python

```

# Installation
## Using Pip
```bash
pip install JaxOpenSimplexNoise
```
## From Source
```bash
cd <dir>
git clone https://github.com/SaundersJE97/JaxOpenSimplexNoise.git
export PYTHONPATH = $PYTHONPATH:<dir>/JaxOpenSimplexNoise:
```
